title: Game won't let me login
body: As per title, I enter my details and hit login. Game says logging on, hangs there then comes up with an error msg. I have tried repairing the client, clearing my cache and checked firewall and antivirus to ensure not blocked and it still won't login (yes I have restarted my computer). Anyone have an idea how to fix this?

replies.body: Who is your ISP? Have you tried to log in while using a VPN(even a free one, since you dont need to worry about latency)?
With Telstra, got a vpn but never had a problem with it until recently. Problem disappeared, reappeared with the new update.

I'm sorry I can't help you. I'm with Foxtel and was having a similar issue. I was able to log in with a VPN while the issue was ongoing, but it seems to have been fixed by powers outside my control the other day. I'm still not sure what the cause was.

Perhaps try talking to your ISP? It could be a similar problem Telstra haven't jumped on yet.
